testcase.name: Add new discount
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome browser............................................passed When User opens URL "http://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"...............passed And User enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin"......passed And Click on Login..........................................................passed Then User can view Dashboad.................................................passed When User clicks on promotions menu.........................................passed And clicks on discounts.....................................................passed And click on Add new button.................................................passed Then User can view add new discount page....................................passed When User enters discount info..............................................passed And click on Save button....................................................passed Then User can view confirmation message "The new discount has been added successfully".passed And close browser...........................................................passed
